title: Telo MT1
author: turtleyacht
aiHeadline: Telo MT1: The future of trucking, but only if you're willing to spend a small fortune on a vehicle that looks like it's straight out of a sci-fi movie.

title: This Month in Ladybird
author: net01
aiHeadline: This Month in Ladybird: Because who needs world news when you can read about ladybugs and their tiny, insignificant adventures in the insect world?

title: We may not like what we become if A.I. solves loneliness
author: defo10
aiHeadline: AI may solve loneliness, but at the cost of turning us all into emotionally dependent cyborgs who can't function without a digital companion to hold our virtual hands.

title: Terence Tao on the suspension of UCLA grants
author: dargscisyhp
aiHeadline: Terence Tao weighs in on UCLA grant suspensions: Because who better to explain the complexities of academic funding than the guy who probably invented math in his spare time.

title: Why Exercise Is a Miracle Drug
author: zdw
aiHeadline: Exercise is a miracle drug, but only if you can somehow muster the willpower to leave your couch, which, let's be honest, is a feat on par with landing on the moon.
